title: Aggressive ADC/SUP or FILL looking for team ( Gold III ) +
body:
Hello,

I can play all roles but I am most effective in the bottom lane, I play a very aggressive natural which tends to make me win most of my games as an adc/sup.

Understands majority of techniques withing the game like freezing etc.

Pref a fun team but can become serious if we are hugely successful,

Cheers,
Saedas
